group_1.textLeft: Haro haro!@Come warm up!
Ah, Ash, those clothes you're wearing...
That's the outfit that won you that contest, isn't it?

group_1.textRight: Hai desu!@Did you hear it from Riko?

group_1.textLeft: You won a special prize in the contest...
...from the brand that created Kumanosuke,@I heard?
And then they played with the design a bit and@turned it into a product!
That's really something, huh?

group_1.textRight: Arigato!!@It made me super stoked too!

group_1.textLeft: Though Riko got a little lonely.
You never showed her the original design...

group_1.textRight: Oh...
I would've been glad to show Riko too, but...
It's totally a bit too early for her...

group_1.textLeft: Like what?!@An adult design?!

group_1.textRight: It's more just my personal taste.
Let me see...@I would like some paper and a pen.

group_1.textLeft: Hyup.

group_1.textRight: The original design went down like this.

group_1.textLeft: GROSS!

group_1.textRight: Scary!
And now you know...

group_1.textLeft: So Kumanosuke's original design was like...@Nomming something?

group_1.textRight: He's eating a rabbit.@On the hunt, you know!

group_1.textLeft: So this is...the rabbit's blood?!
A carnivore stuffed animal?@You're crazy, Kumanosuke!

group_1.textRight: Chigau!@This little guy's not Kumanosuke!
Kumanosuke is an only child that I got from Daddy,@you see!

group_1.textLeft: Of course!@Sorry, sorry.
Oh, there's some kinda rabbit thing drawn here too.
...Fur?

group_1.textRight: That's what this bear was wearing during his hunt.
You're saying...it pretends to be a rabbit.@And when a rabbit approaches...

group_1.textLeft: CHOMP!
...Like that?

group_1.textRight: Hai!@Hunt by mimicry!

group_1.textLeft: Mimicry...
All that evolution for nothin'!

group_1.textRight: And this is between you and me, but...
This fur is the parent of the rabbit he's eating now.

group_1.textLeft: Hol...there's more and more scary scenes all over@here...!
...There's another bear here, but it's all like ripped@to shreds, isn't it?

group_1.textRight: Those are remains from when a rabbit ate him up,@you see.

group_1.textLeft: Eh...?@Do rabbits eat bears?

group_1.textRight: In this world they eat eeeverything! And bear cotton@is their favorite food, yo!

group_1.textLeft: This world's darker than I could have imagined...

group_1.textRight: This is what Waloli Gurokawa-sensei's world@is all about, you see.

group_1.textLeft: Yep, this is definitely too early for Riko.
If you showed her this, she might start crying...

group_1.textRight: ...So I couldn't show her either way.

group_1.textLeft: Anywho, it's crazy this design's used for the clothes.

group_1.textRight: It totally is...@The pros are killing it!
The design has that guro kawaii vibe!
Next time, I'll try to be more mindful about it!

group_1.textLeft: Then you can show it off to Riko.

group_1.textRight: Sou!@I'll do my best, yo!
